mapper.update: update interactTempCar set lockBatchId=#{lockBatchId},stealerId=#{stealerId},lockStatus=-1, lockTime=#{lockTime} where daystamp=#{daystamp} and lockStatus=1 and type>0 order by r limit 5
mapper.select: select a.*,b.nickName as driver from ( SELECT * FROM interactTempCar where lockBatchId=#{uuid}) a left join usersAccount b on a.userId=b.id
mapper.update: update interactTempCar set hadGet=1,lockStatus=2,stealTime=now(), stealerId=#{stealerId} where hadGet=0 and lockStatus=-1 and uuid=#{uuid}
update interactTempCar set blackIds=CONCAT(blackIds,#{blackIds}) where travelId=#{travelId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from interactTempCar where userId=#{userId} and type=1 and lockStatus=1 and DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d')=daystamp
select * from interactTempCar where userId=#{userId} and type=1 and lockStatus=1 and DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d')=daystamp GROUP BY travelId
mapper.update: UPDATE interactTempCar SET lockStatus=1 WHERE lockStatus=-1 and lockTime<${compareTimes} and hadGet=0
mapper.delete: delete from interactTempCar WHERE type=0 and lockStatus=-1 and lockTime<${compareTimes} and hadGet=0
